column4: anyone know how to fix this : Starting amavisd: Error in config file "/etc/amavis/conf.d/05-domain_id": Insecure directory in $ENV{PATH} while running with -T switch at /etc/amavis/conf.d/05-domain_id line 7.
look at what's referencved in line 7 then work out why it thinks it's insecure
/etc/mailname is what it points to and that is set to -rw-r--r--
